Townhomes at Mountain View- How Home Should feel.
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2.5 Bath, approximately 1323 Sq.
Ft.
Your search for a spacious, open-concept townhome will end with a visit to Townhomes at Mountainview.
We offer a wide selection of two-bedroom two and one-half bathroom homes as well as three-bedroom two bathroom and three-bedroom two and one-half bathroom homes.
Your new home will have plenty of space for the entire family and all the conveniences you look for.

Each residence comes with an oversized kitchen including black and silver appliances and updated fixtures, walk-in closets and pantries, full-size washers and dryers and the best part is- every home comes with a one or two-car attached garage!
Your entire family can enjoy relaxing in a spacious open-concept family room, reading by natural light with stunning views through large windows, or simply relaxing on your expansive deck or patio.
When you reside at Townhomes at Mountainview you will have access to something for all ages to love.
Townhomes at Mountainview has you covered, because we offer a variety of things to enjoy.
Like a playground and community grilling areas for picnicking outside.
Our community is nearby some of the best hiking, biking, and jogging trails for those wishing to enjoy nature.
Our goal is to offer you the best options in your future home.
Each Newly Renovated townhome boasts the best amenities and decor like USB outlets, a gas fireplace, warm-tone paint schemes, and plenty of natural lighting.
As a pet-friendly community, we have plenty of open space to play with the family dog.
Looking for some excitement?
Residing here puts you minutes from fantastic dining, shopping, and entertainment in Puyallup, Sumner, and Tacoma.
No matter what you desire in your future community; rest easy knowing Townhomes at Mountainview has you covered.
A home with plenty of family space, a great community, and easy access to anything else you want.
Contact our leasing office to schedule a tour now.
